description: The function is vulnerable as it uses HTTP instead of HTTPS for transmitting data, which can expose sensitive information to potential attackers. This is known as Cleartext Transmission of Sensitive Information (CWE-319). Additionally, the function could be vulnerable to Server-Side Request Forgery (SSRF) (CWE-918) as it takes a URL and makes a request to it without validating the URL, potentially allowing an attacker to make requests to internal resources.
